author: serge
msg: Finished off first take at listservs.  GenericListserv is generic implementation of a listserv, and there are Avalon and Town imlementations that define who is on the listserv and any settings.  GenericListservManager is a generic implementation of a way to add or remove yourself from the listserv via email.  There is an Avalon implementation of this.  CommandForListserv is a simple matcher that makes it easy to spot these commands for the Avalon implementation of this.
Also renamed TownMailRepository to TownSpoolRepository (in preparation of having a "smart" db mail repository that is more useful for listserv message archives)
Need to build SQL scripts for generating tables for aliasing and listserv stuff.  Coming soon.

author: serge
msg: Renamed delayed spool to the outgoing spool for remote delivery.

author: serge
msg: Set it to build the mailet.jar file in addition to the JAMES.jar file.

author: serge
msg: Started making some notes of project progress.

msg: Implemented new sendMail method and updated bounce methods to new signature (new exception allowed).
